response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous error or code to explain. The task is to put a pottable daffodil in the pot. From the observed objects and relations, we can see that the pottable daffodil is on the lawn and the plant pot is on the driveway. The robot needs to first move to the daffodil, grasp it, then move to the pot and put the daffodil in the pot.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the pottable daffodil
(2) Grasp the pottable daffodil
(3) Move to the plant pot
(4) Put the pottable daffodil in the plant pot
response.code:
